website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W330 is an OK pocket camera, but a little more money will get you a lot more features.
cons: Skimpy feature set for the money

customer_reviews.title: sony cyber-shot 330
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of the Sony cyber shots (DSC series) I have bought. Every time they go up in mega-bits I get a new one. I am a professional photography and have high-end cameras for paying jobs, but for fun stuff and portability you can't beat this pocket size Sony. I never leave the house without my wallet, cell and Sony camera. The 330 is even slimmer that previous models. I love all the features and I have full control of how to photo is going to come out. The Carl Zeiss lens is a big plus. I highly recommend this camera if you are looking for a point and shoot.
customer_reviews.author: MontgomerySlim

customer_reviews.title: Never buy from Las Vegas Bargain
customer_reviews.text: They new this camera was no good. Why put something on line for people to purchase and it is not even working. Now I have to go to the hassel of sending it back. Taking a bus to go to a drop off place. When I order this camera I was looking to use it right away. I have one in black but the lock is broken and I wanted to get another one. I put my Sd card and battery into the camera and all I got was a piece of picture. I guess you pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: toblessedtobestressed

customer_reviews.title: awesome deal and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Saw this great price in my Target ad- and searched to make sure it was as good as it sounded. Great reviews, then saw Amazon had the deal thru Target. this saved me a trip on a busy week, and I happened to have an Amazon coupon. Extra good deal! Just got to start using it recently on a vacation- SO easy to carry in my purse, and the color is great when there are several friends all with 'silver' cameras who have them all out on the table at dinner. Very happy with this purchase- the shipping was fast!
customer_reviews.author: excitablesm

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W330 14.1 MP Digital Camera Bought at Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my husband for his birthday. He is not very technologically savvy. So far, he's figured out how to charge the battery, take pictures, insert the memory stick and transfer his pictures to his laptop. The pictures come out very focused and clear. He is so proud of the images he captures! I've got a Casio Z9 and we're always comparing photos. This Sony DSC-W330 camera takes much clearer pictures than my Casio. If you're shopping for a user-friendly camera that takes very clear images, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: RitaAnn

customer_reviews.title: The Sony DSC-W330 isa winner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Sony DSC-W330 and I bought is because I love it. I like the simplicity and precision of this little camera. The Carl Zeiss lens gives me nice sharp pics so when I crop out and close in, I have great clarity in faces. Bigger cameras are too bulky to put in a purse and this one gives me great sharp pics and good color so it's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny & Layne

customer_reviews.title: an excellent second camera.
customer_reviews.text: an excellent camera for less. I recommend it as a second camera.
customer_reviews.author: lenny foster

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the wide angle shots and it took awesome outside shots! My problem was inside, most of the time they blurred the first shot and I would have to retake them. They would be dark too. I tried making adjustments, but it didn't help. Also when I would get those blurred pictures, sometimes the moment was gone so I couldn't take a second one. My camera was dropped and damaged so I opted not to get this same camera...too many missed shots.
customer_reviews.author: JesusSaves

customer_reviews.title: Sony Junkie
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Cyber-Shot camera. This one takes excellent photos just like its predecessor. My only complaint is that the button to take the pictures is recessed more than on my previous camera. It's more difficult to snap the perfect photo when you cannot find the button. The power button is even more recessed. Other than that, this is a great camera and I've already taken some great shots with it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love Sony cameras, this is the 3rd I've had (first was old and second was stolen). This camera has everything I was looking for: 1. Slim 2. Easy to use 3. Quick shutter 4. Large viewscreen 5. Good zoom I did my research and even went into Best Buy to ask about the best cameras. If you are looking for a basic point and shoot, you will likely be very happy with this purchase. It is a great price for the quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: L. Picco

customer_reviews.title: Quality Is Not As Good As Older Models
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace an older, simular model. Seems like Sony has decided to cheapen it production process in order to sell to the lower end. She complains the latch on the battery door, the latch for the battery itself and the overall quality and performance of the camera is not as good as her older model.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Veal

customer_reviews.title: Lots of megapixels and lots of disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This camera has decent specs and you'd think it would be an amazing casual camera for an average picture taker, but the picture quality is actually pretty terrible. I can't seem to get it to take a clear picture, although, admittedly, it COULD be user error (although my husband and friends are unable to take good pictures with it as well).
customer_reviews.author: J. Gurney

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pics are great. I have had this camera for about three years now and its still going strong. The only issue I have with it is the shooter delay. Its also important to note it focuses only after you tilt the camera. I guess I should have read the direction right when I bought it lol.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this camera package for my daughter for her b'day and loved it so much that I purchased another one for my husband for our anniversary trip. It is so compact and lightweight and yet, takes great pictures. Would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn C.

customer_reviews.title: simply disastrous...
customer_reviews.text: We had a Sony camera for several years that finally gave up the ghost, and thought this model would make a good replacement. Unlike the prior model, it offers virtually no user control. Worst of all, there is a considerable delay between pushing the shutter button and the picture being taken, resulting in lots of lost shots. There's apparently no way to adjust for bright backgrounds, so beach and snow shots are not really possible. Pictures come out dark, and due to the delay, often blurred. We bought one for our son and his wife, and the same issues show up in their photos. The display is good though.....
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Handy Enough yet versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is the replacement of the prior model to fit the water proof case. The current models are some water proof. I have tried the prior model during the snorkeling in French Polynesia, For the price of the camera, there are some pros and cons but works good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Tomono

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera At A Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera in great condition but didn't have the USB cord needed to download pictures to the pc, I had to order one after it came. I was expecting to be able to use it right away , so that was a little disappointing .
customer_reviews.author: The PinUp Girl2BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this camera a week ago and it works amazingly. The quality of the image is great and I love the features it has such as the smile detector and its ability to recognize the setting of the picture you are trying to take whether it is a landscape shot or a night shot. It is also not as complicated as some other cameras I have had. Overall it was a great buy and I would recommend it. I cannot wait to use it in Europe!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it should, take pictures. The only thing I found I didn't like was that the battery life doesn't last as long as I would have liked and sometimes it takes the camera forever to focus. So I have people smiling and waiting for me to take a picture only for me to say "hold on."
customer_reviews.author: sdnx21

customer_reviews.title: Consistent but not spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Have been a Kodak person forever but finally got fed up with the poor indoor/low light shots and problems with memory cards. The sony does seem to be more consistant in low light and the video is very nice but that is about all it does better. Also when taking outdoor pictures the Kodak is GREAT and noticablily sharper than what I have been able to get from the Sony. Other problem is that the Sony has even a longer shutter time than the Kodak which I did not think was possible!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Ezra

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy to use, great size for easy to carry. This is my fourth purchase of this particular camera and all of them are in use by members of our family.
customer_reviews.author: m~u508

customer_reviews.title: Sony 14.1 MP digital camera -GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the camera and the great pictures I have taken . It is small ,thin and very portable. Fits into your jacket. I took it hiking during the Christmas vacation. I took many excellent pics with it .I highly recommend it.I also like the fast a ship free delivery after Thanks Giving.
customer_reviews.author: igor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: There is a yellow tint to all the pictures. The price was reduced, and I can see why. The picture quality is poor also. I would have sent the camera back, but they said it was beyond 30 day return policy. Don't buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ms C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This camera is exactly what I was looking for: something easy to use in all conditions (the easy mode quickly select the best parameters for shooting), but at the same time, easy to configure manually (for a more expert use). The quality of the pictures is excellent. It's light (and tiny) enough to be carried around in a pocket. The battery lasted a few days, surviving the low temperatures of high mountains. If someone wants to be on the safest side, I'd recommend buying a second battery.
customer_reviews.author: Andreazio

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot starter camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a very good point and shoot camera. The picture quality is excellent and this was something I was most interested in. Sony is known to make good cameras.If you need a quality starter camera this is the one. You would not disappoint yourself. The battery life is nice. Please do not compare the settings with an SLR.
customer_reviews.author: Utkarsh Seth

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W330
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great my other Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W330 went to Africa with my daughter. This allows me to get the movies and pictures on my computer. Thanks for getting it here so quickly!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Atchley

customer_reviews.title: Sony
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sony camera and I bought this because I wanted a higher pixel number. (my old one was only 6-so time for an upgrade) I love this camera b/c it is just as easy to figure out as my last one. I hardly referred to the directions so far b/c of my familiarity with Sony. I love the upgrade of my photos. And I was able to get it in my favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Judith D. Muellner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broken just after not even 3 months of LIGHT use. Screen is black, nor will it take any pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Quality Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This Sony Cyber-Shot W330 camera was given as a gift and is replacing an older Sony Cyber-Shot, which was used as a cushion between a ladies bum and a frozen lake. The old camera housing was great, but the lens didn't survive the impact. The W330 is working beautifully. Stabilization has improved, with very few blurred pictures. I am happy with this choise and would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Scully

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for catching those memorable moments. At 14.1 MP it takes some high quality pictures. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: chirper9

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: It works great and all. Nice pictures. Great large LCD screen, only issue is that the built-in speaker is almost inaudible. So if you plan to playback videos on it, you will struggle hearing back anything. Other than that, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I had just purchased a Pentax before I purchased this Sony because I loved my Pentax I had before. Unfortunately I was very disappointed with it. My best friend had an awesome camera that was a Sony so I decided to try the brand. I love my new camera! It's very compact and the picture quality is amazing! It is so easy to use that I didn't even have to read the manual first. I really love the rechargeable battery too. I think I am a Sony customer now!
customer_reviews.author: hitachi13

customer_reviews.title: OK, not Durable
customer_reviews.text: It's been close to two years since I've had this camera. In the beginning, it was fully functional and took decent pictures yet not to the crispness that I would have like to see. It's use hasn't been heavy or anything but it is now rather bothersome. The pictures always seem to come out rather blurry and the menu button doesn't work properly. I guess I've used up it's lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great, Easy-to-Use Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 13 year old daughter. She loves it! It is easy to use and small enough to take anywhere. She figured out how to use it, download and print pictures from it all by herself. The price was unbeatable too!
customer_reviews.author: V. Aportadera

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC- W330 14.1 MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far I have bought 3 Sony DSC- W330 14.1 MP cameras as gifts for my relatives in india and for my own use. The camera takes excellent crisp and clear pictures. The camera is light and handy.The screen size is 3". The lense is Carl Zeiss which adds value to the performance of the camera. The wide angle lense enhances the capability of camera to take large number of people at short distance.An excellent product I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Koylerian

customer_reviews.title: I received the order and I am very happy and pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Hello ... I received the order and I am very happy and pleased with the purchase. Packing in excellent condition and fast to reach my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo del Carmen Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: the only drawback is that the memory card needs an adapter, which doesnt work for me. i may be using it wrong (how can i use it wrong?), but apart from that the camera works great, charges quickly, and provides quality photos.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I did receive this camera on time, and covered my expectations. I recommend it to buy it as this is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Dayled Colina

customer_reviews.title: Love it for the price, but unimpressive low light picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to gift it to a relative. Took a few shots with it and noticed that pictures taken indoors are not that great, but overall it is a very good camera for the price. My wife loved the color, and wanted to replace our old silver one.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay K. Pedhagandham

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-W330
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and I try it out. It is a very fine camera. Serve the completed purpose for a camera. Nice picture quality, face detection is awsome. If you need easy to use camera. This one is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Yiamthe1

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC 14.1MP
customer_reviews.text: I bought the package deal for my daughter for her birthday and so far she loves it. Definitely need to buy the extra card but the camera is easy to use and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera both in single shot mode and video mode and it works great. It takes very clear pictures, it is lightweight and easy to use. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine L

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera, way to sensitive to some light sources.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is just awesome, i wanted something that i wont be lugging around through out the theme park and then i found this camera. The shots are awesome and even the video was nice. I was going to but an even more expensive camera but im going to just hold on tight to this camera, I love this camera it was like it wasnt even in the way. Get this camera if your going to any theme park, It wont be in your way at all.
customer_reviews.author: oso

customer_reviews.title: THE RECOMMEND!!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM SUPER HAPPY WITH MY PURCHASE. I HAVE MANAGED TO CAPTURE AMAZING IMAGES WITH THE CAMERA. IT MAKES THE AUTOMATIC ADJUSTMENT. THERE ARE FEW PICTURES COMING OUT BLURRY OR MUCH BRIGHTNESS, I LOVE HAVING MADE A GOOD PURCHASE AND FACT HAVE AN EXCELLENT INVESTMENT
customer_reviews.author: Mafalda

customer_reviews.title: not the best
customer_reviews.text: this was first Sony camera that we bought, we had a canon before, both in the same price range, but I would definitely prefer the Canon one due to (1) better image resolution, and (2) more lasting battery charges.
customer_reviews.author: sk

customer_reviews.title: The size of the canon camera is easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.text: The size of this canon camera is very easy to carry around and use. Without all the complicated functions on the camera, it is easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: 94shadow

customer_reviews.title: A nice camera but could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera. It's quite compact and light weight. Previously I had always used Canon cameras so it has been a little difficult to adjust to. I'm still looking for an attribute I prefer over Canon but that hasn't happened yet. As far as the purchase it was at the lowest possible price, arrived on time and was in excellent condition so I would consider it a great deal. Only time will tell if I like the photos and how durable it will turn out to be.
customer_reviews.author: Leeno

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wonderful little camera over a month ago. It takes great, crisp photos and is easy to focus from macro to mountains. Not happy with the USB port or the shorter than my other Sony Cybershot battery life. One problem I just noticed is a shadow stripe thru the screen about an inch long by 1/8 inch wide. What has caused this? It doesn't effect the quality of the photos. Overall, I love the simplicity, easy to carry and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stowers

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera since January and now it doesn't work. The lens keeps sticking.
customer_reviews.author: T.Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging and all worked as expected. Takes pictures. I have not had a chance to do any major comparison yet.
customer_reviews.author: B&Okie

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I decided to buy this camera. It has everything I was looking for. It takes a crisp clear video, has the smile feature and can slip into your pocket. It's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: YOMIRA BELLORIN
customer_reviews.text: EXCELENTE PRODUCTO. LLEGO EN BUEN ESTADO A VENEZUELA. CAMARA DE GRAN CALIDAD. RECOMIENDO AL VENDEDOR RESPONSABLE Y EFECTIVO. ESPERO PODER DISFRUTAR OTROS PRODUCTOS
customer_reviews.author: Yomira Bellorin

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I don't buy too many cameras but I was very disappointed that this camera didn't come with a memory card
customer_reviews.author: honibea

customer_reviews.title: half working
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it this unit only or this model's "feature" - it will randomly take unexpectedly longer time between the button down and the shutter action.
customer_reviews.author: gardenworker

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Simple but good enough to take decent photos. It has a good looking and its flash works just fine. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera...you should get it. It is a good deal for all its features. I have had it for 7 months now and totally loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Goz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, good photos. Difficulty is figuring out how to download other than the Sony program which is not so easy to edit.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good camera to carry all the time. It has two slots to accept an SD card and the sony stick. Excellent quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fiorito

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 7th sony camera. I've always upgraded to another sony. This one is identicle to my last one and the ONLY reason it needed replacing is because I dropped it and shattered the lens. You just can't go wrong with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just love this camera. All the different features on the camera is really good, esp the movies recording mode.
customer_reviews.author: eavean

customer_reviews.title: Pink is her color
customer_reviews.text: This was for my daughter who takes pics all the time it has lasted really well and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Rosinke

customer_reviews.title: pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, large screen and very sharp pictures. Sony has outdone itself on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Maynard M. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: just wonderful
customer_reviews.text: They represent more than one brand, a commitment to the customer, who expects a better service delivery. Catalog as a product of high quality. I am very pleased with this investment. I therefore recommend this brand to the community widely Amazon in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Neyla  Johanna Moronta Hinestroza

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently received this camera for my birthday. It is the best camera ever!!!! It takes beautiful pictures and videos. I really wanted a camera and I bought a Flip and it was awful. I decided to get this camera and I don't have any regrets. People say it takes forever to load and then take a picture, but it doesn't. This is the best quality of a camera I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Nydia DiCarali

customer_reviews.title: Nice decent camera
customer_reviews.text: nice decent camera for everyday use or for trips. light weigh and slim. great looking in black. have no problems with it yet...just wished that it would have came with a pouch and sd card.
customer_reviews.author: klumsylillbunny

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC W330 - Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I received to product just a week after I ordered it. The camera itself is really nice. It makes great pictures and I love the colour of the camera. It is a great camera for portraits. The LCD screen is large so you can see your pics very good. Without a memory card you can only take 4 pictures so you also have to buy some memory for your camera as well. It is a great camera for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT, IS VERY EASY TO USE, EXCELLENTE PICTURE, GOOD PICTURES, WAS WHAT I WAS LOCKING FOR!!
customer_reviews.author: Andres Santana

customer_reviews.title: Did not measure up.
customer_reviews.text: I researched this item before ordering. The test photos I tried did not come close to those online. I have used many digital point and shoot (Canon, Lumix, Olympus) and have a DSLR. Even though higher megapixels, this camera did not measure up to any of those. I returned it. The only advantage is its size.
customer_reviews.author: amolba

customer_reviews.title: Best Camara for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had previously owned the same model before it got stolen and because it was such a great camera I looked for its replacement by searching for the exact same model and I found it here in amazon.com. The camara has a great image, and the video quality is good, and it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC
customer_reviews.text: This was also purchased as an insurance settlement and it went to my grandson he loves it. it takes very good pictures
customer_reviews.author: Kim Coleman

customer_reviews.title: sony digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Was a gift for son. He did research, and claims it works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: library junkie

customer_reviews.title: Sony Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The price was great, and it arrived quickly. LOVE the blue color! Stands out from all the silver colored ones in my family! This is my first digital camera, so I was looking for something easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Britt-10

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a while now and overall it's been a pretty decent camera. My only complaint with these is the "delay" when you push down the darn button to take the picture. What's up with that?? When I hit the button I want it to take the picture NOW, not in a couple seconds when the shot may be lost. After we used it for a year or so we gave it to our daughter to play with and to take pics, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Doheny

customer_reviews.title: nice, depending on what you are interested in.
customer_reviews.text: this product is nice, has great features. If you are looking for features like panoramic picture taking and burst shots, then get the 350. It bought both and prefer the 350. The 330 is still a nice camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcgibbon

customer_reviews.title: good camera but i wish pictures weren't so blurry
customer_reviews.text: takes good pictures but it takes 2/3 shots to get a good picture because it came out blurry. It takes alot of blurry pictures so I returned it. I really like the quality of the pictures, wish it did better and not be so blurry. The big screen is nice to have too.
customer_reviews.author: nvEl

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as gift to myself. Truly enjoyed it. Now I have upgraded and gave it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate !! Although my usage has been limited, so far I"m happy with the results of my photos. Take into account the price I paid and it's a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice aim and shoot camera. Superior quality pictures.
customer_reviews.text: On a limited budget, I would say this is a good value for money. If money wasn't my concern I would have gone for a SLR. The camera is convenient if you are looking for a nice "aim and shoot" camera and worth every penny. The quality of display (LCD) and the digital image are excellent in this range.
customer_reviews.author: Vinayak

customer_reviews.title: almost a five star
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera--takes excellent pictures and is easy to use. Would have gave it 5 stars if the zoom feature would work in the video mode.
customer_reviews.author: Norman G. Mcintosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. Not great in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It has a ton of options & the pictures come out fabulous; except in low light situations. It takes awhile to focus & the pictures just don't come out very well in low light. There is also a lag for it to take the picture in low light, so if you are dancing & want to get shots off quick, this is not the camera for that. Still, I love it for all the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Serrin Melena

customer_reviews.title: This camera is a good value
customer_reviews.text: I am SO pleased with this purchase. It's my second Cybershot. I love the image stabalization and the ability to take pics quick since I have a 5-yr-old granddaughter. It's easy to navigate and makes really quality photos for the price.
customer_reviews.author: yelleah

customer_reviews.title: Takes beautiful pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after doing much research online and in store. I decided that Sony would definitely be the best camera along with the Carl Zeiss" lense. I was looking for a camera that had a quick shutter and a clear picture. This camera along with the Sony memory card works great.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build and picture quailty
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my camera. I needed it in a hurry to bring with me on my vacation and it came in 3 days, i brought it with me and the battery life and 14.1mp saved my fun weekend. It focuses very quickly, flash is professional grade, and the picture quality is just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bmel

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC W330 14.1MP
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera. I had an old model that I had purchased about 5 years ago finally give it out because the On button got jammed after 5 years of two small toddlers playing with them, and I hope this one lasts me just as long. It takes great pictures and video too!
customer_reviews.author: CecyC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had the sony dsc-w290 for a while now and figured this camera would be comparable to its quality. It isn't even close. It is made cheap unlike the dsc-w290. Returned the item and bought a canon s95. It was much more expensive but MUCH better quality. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: twothdoc

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to be shopping for a new camera and after reading the reviews on Amazon I decided to purchase this one with my Christmas gift money. I am so pleased and happy I did. The pictures are wonderful with great clarity. It's easy to use and I like the size!
customer_reviews.author: S. Clement

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is exactly what I was looking for. I had already purchased this exact camera and was buying as a gift. The pictures are great. If you take time to work with the settings you can get really great images. I was also please with the cost.
customer_reviews.author: puravida6684

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price !
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great for the price, the only thing I didn't like is that I have to take the battery out of the camera to charge it, other than that is an awsome camera.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot 14.1
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera, at least the battery holds up and it does take great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: K. Down

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! Fantastic pics! Comes with charger that battery slides into to plug in wall. Say half hour, pop it in, ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: BiMiNiGiRL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera a lot. It takes very nice pics and is very user friendly. Got a great deal so I am very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lady of the house
customer_reviews.text: It was as advertized. My wife loves it with the big viewer and easy to operate. She really likes the color and one of reasons she picked it. Have not use the Video yet. She points and shoots everything with an 8G in it!
customer_reviews.author: rainbird

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!,
customer_reviews.text: Buy with confident... Is a great value you won't regret....the picture quality is good... Is portable... The battery last long... Bottom line a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Q

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: EVERYONE LIKES MY CAMERA. THE PICTURE IT TAKES, THE IMAGE, THE COLOR, THE BIG 3" LCD IS FABULOUS. IT IS EASY TO USE ALSO. FROM 1 TO 10, I GIVE IT A 10.
customer_reviews.author: Norby R. Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: strshine3
customer_reviews.text: Love this Sony Digital Camera. Take beautiful quality pictures. I must buy if you are needing a camera.
customer_reviews.author: strshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have been using the camera for months and still enjoying the quality with no issues so far. I strongly recommend as a good value for the price
customer_reviews.author: ojbabs

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I've ever held
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this camera! never have i seen such picture quality, I'm amazed on how clear the picture and video comes out. It is a very remarkable camera, and the anti shake really helps a lot, as my hands can't stay still for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the camera. The only thing I miss is the macro. I had it on my Nikon and loved it for close up shots. Otherwise, great and crisp photos.
customer_reviews.author: Sandsjourney

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this canera before & l love it. The pictures & colors are perfect and its small and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahimagic Mirzana

customer_reviews.title: Sony Dsc-W330,14.1MP Digital Camera is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Although price offered saved about 10 to 15% but if accesories like Memory Stick and Carrying Case at reasonable price would have been offered as a package then it would have been good.
customer_reviews.author: pravin

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-W330 14.1MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Angle Zoom with Digital Steady Shot Image Stabilization and 3.0 inch LCD (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedThe DSC-W330 captures amazingly detailed images with a Carl Zeiss 26mm equivalent wide angle 4x zoom lens. Taking and reviewing images is made easy with a large 3.0” LCD and advanced features including Easy mode, iAuto and SteadyShot™ make it easy to capture great images in various conditions.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The DSC-W330 captures amazingly detailed images with a Carl Zeiss 26mm equivalent wide angle 4x zoom lens. Taking and reviewing images is made easy with a large 3.0-inch LCD and advanced features including Easy mode, iAuto and SteadyShot make it easy to capture great images in various conditions. 

Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W330 Highlights 

14-megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor
A powerful 14.1-megapixel, 1/2.3-inch Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 14.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19-inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high-resolution shots. 



The DSC-W330's wide-angle lens delivers the big picture Sony lens with 4x optical zoom with 26mm equivalent wide angle
Sony 4x optical zoom lens with 26mm equivalent wide angle brings distant subjects closer for great outdoor, sports, and travel photos. 

3.0-inch Clear Photo LCD display (230k pixels)
Generous 3.0-inch (230K pixels) Clear Photo LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight. 

Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, and faces, and adjusts settings resulting in clearer images, faces with more natural skin tone, and less blur. By incorporating advanced features such as Intelligent Scene Recognition, Face Detection technology, and SteadyShot image stabilization, iAuto mode lets you take advantage of the latest Sony Cyber-shot technology without leaving auto mode. Whether you're shooting landscapes, capturing a beautiful flower, or taking pictures at an in-door birthday party or wedding shower, iAuto mode will optimize your camera's settings to help ensure you come away with a great shot. 

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode
Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects nine different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings: Backlight, Backlight Portrait, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Portrait, Landscape and Macro . iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep. 

Steady Shot Image Stabilization
SteadyShot image stabilization compensates for camera shake and helps prevent blur by using higher ISO. 

Face Detection technology
Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts flash, focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends. 

Motion Detection
Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces. 

Smile Shutter technology in action Smile Shutter technology
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection Sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can be used together with Smile Shutter mode. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 

Scene modes
The DSC-W330 features 10 convenient scene modes: High Sensitivity, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Soft Snap, Landscape, Beach, Snow, Underwater, Gourmet, Pet. 

Intelligent AF
Thanks to Intelligent AF technology, capture fleeting moments like a child's adorable expression with the ultra-quick AF which locks focus in as little as 0.3 seconds. 

Easy Shooting Mode
With Easy Shooting Mode, even beginners can take great photos. In Easy Shooting Mode, easy-to-understand basic instructions are displayed on the LCD screen and the camera switches to all automatic settings, removing several function choices and allowing you to focus on just your subject. Since this mode works together with Intelligent Scene Recognition, the camera selects the optimum setting for each scene. In addition the easy mode simplifies preview mode. 

Function Guide
This beginner-friendly optional function helps navigate through the various functions and settings displaying the description of chosen functions or settings on the LCD screen. 

In-Camera Retouching Tools
Retouch and enhance your photos on the go with in-camera Trimming and Red-Eye Correction. 

In-camera retouching options 
Lithium-ion battery
Included lithium-ion battery provides added convenience with longer lasting power than alkaline batteries (capacity of 230 images or 115 minutes of still image with the DSC-W330). 

Media card slot 
For convenient storage and sharing of your images, the DSC-W330 accepts Memory Stick Duo/Memory Stick PRO Duo/Memory Stick PRO-HG Duo media (sold separately). 

SD Card Functionality
Sony SD memory cards are the perfect solution for storing and sharing your digital content such as high-quality photos, videos, music, and more. 

Includes Sony PMB (Picture Motion Browser) Software ver. 5.02
Sony Picture Motion Browser software offers a simple, intuitive way to transfer, sort, and view your video and still images on your compatible PC. In addition, multiple output options let you burn your memories to DVD (sold separately), as well as take advantage of one click upload to a number of popular video and photo sharing sites. 

Includes Sony PMBP (Picture Motion Browser Portable) software
With the pre-installed Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Portable software the DSC-W330 makes it easy to pre-select videos and images in the camera and conveniently upload them from the camera to a compatible PC and popular Internet sharing sites without the need for any additional software or install.
feature_bullets: 26mm Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens with 4x optical zoom
14.1-megapixel CCD sensor and 3.0-inch LCD screen (230k pixels)
SteadyShot Image Stabilization reduces blur; iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
Smile Shutter technology automatically captures a smile
Card slot for optional Memory Stick Duo media and SD media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
